SEARCH
Package weather

Class StevensonReading

java.lang.Object
weather.StevensonReading
All Implemented Interfaces:
weather.WeatherReading
public final class StevensonReading extends Object implements weather.WeatherReading
One specific weather reading, namely Stevenson reading, which needs temperature, dew point, wind speed, and total rain as inputs.
